TextView.android:text:
This section is used for adding main contents.

To add main contents, click on the plus button at the top right corner and press OK after filling details.

After that it will create a new Content.

Click on the main Content, it will direct to the Sequencer Section, where you start revising topics with hints.

Long press on the content to get the options Edit/Add Sequence, Delete, Delete all.

Edit/Add Sequence option is used for adding sequences, Delete is used for deleting that particular content and Delete all will delete everything.
